main.name: Siddhesh Pisal
main.description: A machine learning enthusiast strongly inclined towards neural networks, IoT, big data and the art of coding.
main.bio: I love building data driven products, finding patterns, trends and solving real world problems with data driven insights. I am experienced in all phases of product development such as pre-sales, project management, project delivery, estimation, system analysis, design, operations, development and testing. I am research-oriented and a quick learner with strong background in computer science. Looking forward to meet more like-minded people and to learn more concepts, tools and technologies used in the Big Data and Data Science industry.
main.contactmessage: You can get in touch with me for open-source projects, freelance projects, and any exciting work around the technologies I work with.

resume.skillmessage: My expertise lies in synthesizing Machine learning, Predictive Analytics and Big data technologies into integrated solutions. Excellent knowledge of Machine Learning, Mathematical Modeling and Operations Research. Fluent with R, Python, C, Apache Spark, Docker, RDBMS and NoSQL databases. Deep understanding & exposure of Big Data Ecosystem.

education.school: Aegis School of Business, Telecommunication and Data Science jointly certified with IBM
education.degree: (PGP) in Data Science, Big Data and Business Analytics
education.description: Created ML pipelines for various types of regression, classification, time-series problem statements. Created end-to-end dashboarding solutions using these projects.
Created an anti-theft mobile application using Airtel GPS API for precise location tracking.

work.title: Data Scientist
work.description: As the founding member of this start-up 'Eugenie.ai' (a subsidiary of Fractal Analytics), my role is to develop the automated insight discovery and anomaly detection capabilities of Eugenie. Major responsibilities include building the product, developing algorithms, backend engineering (optimizing and scaling the performance of existing infrastructure), testing and handling client requirements, engagement and deliveries.
bullet_points: Developed unsupervised anomaly detection algorithms using time-series, isolation and deep learning techniques
Led development of a completely integrated and automated forecasting engine
Managed long-term engagements with Fortune 500 companies like Cisco, Reckitt Benckiser, P&G, Unilever, Colgate-Palmolive, Comcast, Coca-cola etc.
Worked with an Indian Defense unit for multiple use-cases
Partnered with business users to equip them to use self-service capabilities in the product
Led development efforts for real-time forecasting as well as anomaly detection for predictive maintenance

work.title: Data Science Intern
work.description: Developed Eugenie as an automated, anomaly based alert system for the business assistant 'Cuddle.ai'.
bullet_points: Implemented time series analysis on large-scale data using Python and Spark
Implemented a RESTful interface serving to multiple front-ends for multiple clients

work.title: Officer – Online Business
work.description: Handled online sales by understanding customers’ requirements and helping customers narrow down on suitable products.
bullet_points: Led a sales team of 4 customer executives.
Utilized SQL knowledge to manage data for the online retail website.
Wrote content for descriptions and specifications of various music instruments published on the website (https://www.furtadosonline.com)

projects.title: Eugenie.ai
projects.category: An automated insight discovery and anomaly detection engine

projects.title: Cuddle.ai
projects.category: Former mobile business assistant, now an Experiential Analytics product

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: A React based resume website template

projects.title: La Bodega
projects.category: A recommendation engine web-app for wines using K-Means and ALS

testimonials.text: Siddhesh is a quick learner and gives a lot of thought to details. He is very hands on with all the concepts that he knows. His dedication and discipline are his key strengths. He takes in all the feedback and suggestions and works on them and tries to improve himself constantly. Very proactive in terms of giving ideas and implementing them. He listens to people and that's a great quality. All the best for future endeavours.

Siddhesh is an extremely talented and hard-working individual. We have worked together on several projects at Cuddle.ai and what probably makes him shine out amidst the crowd would be his ability to grasp concepts and learning new things at a lightening pace and his hard-working demeanor. He is that one individual who wouldn't back out from accepting a challenge and would burn the midnight oil to get the product delivered right on time.  Not surprisingly enough, he has been the brightest star in the extremely talented small team at Cuddle.ai. I would highly recommend him for his work ethics and his never-say-die attitude.
